content:
For the 1-hour countdown post, you want to create a sense of urgency and encourage your followers to set a reminder so they don't miss your live stream. Here's an idea:

**Post idea:**

Create a post with a bold, eye-catching graphic or a photo that stands out. You can use a countdown timer or a clock to emphasize the limited time left.

**Caption ideas:**

* "IT'S TIME! ⏰ Only 1 hour to go until my live Reels session! 📹 Don't miss out! Set a reminder and join me at [time]! ⏰ #ReelsLive #FinalCountdown"
* "LAST CHANCE! ⏰ Only 1 hour left until I go live on Reels! 📹 Set a reminder and don't miss out on the fun! [time] ⏰ #ReelsLive #Reminder"
* "COUNTDOWN COMPLETE! ⏰ It's almost time! Only 1 hour until my live Reels session! 📹 Join me at [time] and let's make it epic! ⏰ #ReelsLive #ItsTime"

**Additional tips:**

* Use a mix of emojis to make the post more attention-grabbing and create a sense of urgency.
* Include a clear call-to-action (CTA) to set a reminder and join you at the specified time.
* Pin the post to the top of your Instagram feed so it's the first thing your followers see when they visit your profile.
* Consider sharing a "swipe-up" link in your Instagram Stories to drive traffic to the post and encourage followers to set a reminder.

By creating a sense of urgency and encouraging your followers to set a reminder, you'll increase the chances of them tuning in to your live stream and engaging with your content. Good luck! 📹
